Description: GRECO LP EG500 GUITAR Made In Japan at Fujigen 1977 Color: BlackSerial # G777057 / 4.6kg Maple Neck Pickup Readings Neck : 7.60k ohm Bridge: 7.61k ohm There are allot of photos all over the Guitar on the link below LINK TO PHOTOS HERE THE VITALS Original Pickups: Fine, they sound awesome. Electrics and Controls: In working condition. Neck / Truss Rod: Straight / WorkingTuners: Function fineFretboard / Frets: Fine, wear as shown. lovely natural coloring / Frets have wear as per the photos, life in them Bridge and Tailpiece: Fine COSMETICS: Our opinion is of course subjective however we always strive to give a good, honest overview of the cosmetics via the numerous Pics, the Condition Rating below and our Comments.Please see all the photos on the link above for the best impression of the Cosmetic Condition. Condition Rating : B- to C+ N: New. A: Used. Nice condition cosmetically, minimal to light cosmetic blemishes only B: Used. Good condition cosmetically, light to medium cosmetic blemishes and some medium aging. C: Used. Fair condition cosmetically, medium to some heavier cosmetic blemishes and aging. D: Used. Quite poor condition cosmetically, has some heavy cosmetic blemishes and aging J: Junk, heavy with some gnarly cosmetic blemishes and aging, needs love! Comment: Pre-loved 1977 Greco EG500 in the always cool Black Finish. Comfortable standard size Neck, awesome Pickups. Cosmetics as per the pics. Finish wear, nicks, dimples, chips aging etc on the Body, Neck and Headstock as shown. Overall in decent pre-loved condition for her age. Please see the pics on the link above to see her all over. We don't do pro level set ups so please service and set up to your own tastes for best results. Please check the photos to check her out closely. Shipping is by DHL Express or EMS Mail both of which are Registered, Insured, and Trackable. Please allow between 3 to 7 days for delivery. Shipping to America by DHL is $115. Australia, Canada, most of Europe, Asia, UK by DHL is $135Please contact for a quote to other countries Payment by PayPal please. -Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges.
